EmailTemplate.name: MTM affiliates email
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot store purchasing card - MTM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As a member of Provider Alliance, you are entitled to the Buying Power benefits negotiated exclusively for you through your Office Depot business account.
Benefits include: • Discounted pricing through leveraging the collective buying power of the MTM affiliates group • Access to a dedicated Account Manager, as well as Furniture, Technology Cleaning and Breakroom, and Copy & Print specialists • Take full advantage of discounts by shopping online or in store • free next day delivery
James Tharp is your dedicated Office Depot Business Account Manager.
He will provide excellent customer service and be a great resource for you. Feel free to give James a call.
James Tharp Office Depot Business Account Manager 855-337-6811 ext 12810 james.tharp@officedepot.com
